headline: Jim Cramer Says He Is “Not a Buyer of Caesar’s Entertainment”
summary: Caesars Entertainment, Inc. (NASDAQ:CZR) is one of the stocks that Jim Cramer looked at. A caller asked about the company, and Cramer stated: “No, I’m not a buyer of Caesar’s Entertainment… I don’t know why we’d want to be in this also-ran. If you want to be in casino, you want to be in WYNN, […]
